error.title: Something went Wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occured on our end. Please try again in a few moments. If the problem persists

notFound.title: Resource not Found
notFound.description: The page or resource you are looking for does not exist, was moved, or was deleted.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.description: You are not authorized to access this resource.

maintenance.title: We're working on it...
maintenance.description: The page is currently under maintenance. Please check back later. You may explore our other pages in the meantime.

footer.heading: Nativity of the Theotokos Church
footer.description: Nativity of the Theotokos Parish of the Russian Orthodox Church in Zimbabwe. Located at Kingsmead Private Chapel, Cnr Rayl Road and Kingsmead Road, Borrowdale, Harare.

home.heroSubtitle: Official website of the Nativity of the Theotokos parish of the Russian Orthodox Church in Zimbabwe. (est. 2025)
home.mailingListDescription: Stay up to date with the latest church news, announcements, and events straight from your mailbox. Enter your email below and subscribe if you haven't already.
home.mailingListSuccessMessage: Thank you for subscribing to our mailing list! We will be keeping you up to date with the latest news, updates, announcements and more.
